submission:
class Solution:
    def maxOperations(self, s: str) -> int:
        ans = 0
        s += '1'
        n = len(s)
        i = 0
        cnt = 0
        while i < n:
            if s[i] == '0':
                i += 1
                continue
            j = i
            while j < n and s[j] == '1':
                j += 1
            ans += cnt
            cnt += j - i
            i = j
        return ans
